description: This file defines a Pydantic data model for movie scripts, sets up an agent for generating movie scripts based on perplexity models, and includes code to invoke the agent and print a response.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class to print the response for a given input.
